channel.title: CVE Feed for Intel Corporation -- Intel Optane memory
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Intel Corporation -- Intel Optane memory

item.title: CVE-2018-3619|2024-08-05T04:50:30.398Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20optane%20memory
item.description: Information disclosure vulnerability in storage media in systems with Intel Optane memory module with Whole Disk Encryption may allow an attacker to recover data via physical access.
